mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM bobogou_basic_sign_contract a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.part_a_name LIKE concat('%',#{partAName},'%')
AND a.part_b_name LIKE concat('%',#{partBName},'%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy}
ORDER BY a.create_date DESC
